frontpage.name: Alejandro Valverde Mahou
frontpage.about_me: Student. Currently in Denmark doing my master's degree. Fan of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, although I like to learn a little about everything. I studied my degree in Computer Engineering at the Carlos III University of Madrid, and now I am studying the MSc. in Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence at the DTU, in Copenhagen.

experiences.title: Internship in FrontEnd Development and React
experiences.content: Internship in the company Global Incubator, where I worked in a React FrontEnd project. The internship was in Madrid.

studies.title: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering in the Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M)
studies.content: Degree in Computer Science and Engineering with minor in Computer Science and a thesis called 'Adversarial Design for the Videogame Industry'

studies.title: MSc. Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence en la Danmarks Tekniske Universitet (DTU)
studies.content: Currently studying the Master of Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence at Kongens Lyngby, Denmark

proyects.title: Bachelor Thesis: Adversarial Design for the Videogame
proyects.content: My bachelor Thesis for Computer Science and Engineering. It consists of the use of Generative Adversarial Networks for the creation of new Pokémon images. The Thesis is written in Spanish, except for the last 10 pages, which serve as a summary in English. My tutor was Alejandro Cervantes Rovira, and I greatly appreciate his help. After defending the job in July 2021, they gave me a 10/10, and I was nominated for Honors, which they finally awarded me in November 2021.

proyects.title: COCO SSD Web app
proyects.content: An attempt to incorporate the Tensorflow COCO SSD network into a web application using Tensorflowjs. It is a very light and simple application to learn how to deploy neural networks in environments other than Python, allowing more interaction with users.

proyects.title: Spanish Interactive Population Map
proyects.content: Small application made with Dash and hosted on Heroku where you can interactively inspect a map of Spain putting different filters. The intention was to learn both how to create interactive plots with Dash and how to deploy web applications with Heroku.

proyects.title: Animal Sound Classsifier
proyects.content: Final project of the Deep Learning subject at the DTU. It consists of the application of different types of neural networks and a hierarchical approach to the problem of classifying different animal sounds.

proyects.title: PokemonBattleBot (in development)
proyects.content: Attempt to build different bots that are capable of performing Pokémon battles on the Smogon platform 'Pokémon Showdown'. I try to apply different artificial intelligence techniques to get multiple different bots.

proyects.title: Hnefatafl
proyects.content: Hnefatafl, also known as Viking chess is a two player strategy game where each player has opposing roles, attacker or defender. The defender's goal is to save the king, and the attacker's goal is to capture it. I wanted to program this game to learn how to use p5.js and have a fun time.

proyects.title: Saving Universe 616
proyects.content: Final project of the Social Graphs and Interactions subject at the DTU. It consists of an analysis of a graph created from the Marvel characters of the 616 universe, from which we obtained different statistics, attributes and analysis.

proyects.title: Pheithar Web Page
proyects.content: This website :P. This page is born from a template that I made with some colleagues, and then I have retouched it to fit my tastes, and allow me to put it as I wanted. It is developed in Angular.

proyects.title: WebCVtemplate
proyects.content: Template where this page comes from. I did it with two colleagues to create our own web pages and learn more about Angular in the process.

proyects.title: Password Generator
proyects.content: A small password generator that allows different parameters depending on the 'flags'. I used it to learn basic 'bash script', and to spend an afternoon :)
